name: Meme Fighter 2
description:
Cover Art by Santiago Nelson

The sequel to the greatest fighting game is finally here!

Battle it out with a friend, or by yourself in the Battle Royale mode!

Choose from over 50 fully voiced characters, such as Shrek, Big Chungus, Baldi, Spongebob, Sans, Killer Bean, Doomslayer, Homer Simpson, Imposter, BF, and more!

More characters are planned for future updates, such as Ugandan Knuckles, who was tragically cut from the Meme Fighter 2 base roster.
